name: Hulvire Fotofolio
author: Fajnor

sections.description:
Plugin for displaying fotofolio with simple picture gallery on wordpress sites.
Simple text entry and thumbnail pictures, option to add multiple images.
sections.installation:
1. Upload hulvire-fotofolio folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place in your pages [huu_fotofolio] or [huu_fotofolio id=“your gallery id”]
  4. in themes huu_fotofolio(); or huu_fotofolio(id=“your gallery id”)

This plugin needs for proper function Meta Box plugin installed.
sections.changelog:

1.3
